fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services
head_office_address: 1400 Eye St NW, Ste 1115 Washington, DC 20005
eu_initiatives: We follow any EU level policies and initiatives that may have an impact on the financial services sector and business services.
goals__remit: Capstone is a global policy analysis and regulatory due diligence research firm based in Washington, DC and London, UK that provides expert advice to companies and long-term investors. Our capabilities are at the international, US federal and state, and European Union and Member State levels. Capstone provides real-time, insightful analysis for private equity investors of the potential policy-driven risks and opportunities presented by specific potential investments or for existing portfolio companies. Capstone's policy analysis team specializes in creating differentiated investment ideas through deep-dive analyses of federal and state policy.
relevant_communication: We publish research for our clients, undertake client projects and organise events and meetings with policy makers. Our events are considered a useful forum allowing for a discussion between industry players and policy makers.
